hero.name: Martin Horváth
hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.description: Full Stack Developer specializing in building intuitive React frontends and robust, Node.js-based backend systems. My expertise includes designing REST APIs with Express.js, managing databases with Prisma and PostgreSQL, and ensuring application-wide robustness with TypeScript. I am committed to writing clean code and efficiently solving complex problems.

project_list.title: PawMap
project_list.description: PawMap is a comprehensive Full Stack web application that leverages modern technologies like React and Node.js to create an interactive, map-based interface. The project's goal is to provide a central platform for pet owners to discover and share pet-friendly locations.

project_list.title: Silver Arrow Car
project_list.description: For Silver Arrow Car Ltd., I created a dynamic digital showroom that transforms car buying into an experience. On the platform, prospective buyers can not only view and filter cars but also create a 'virtual garage.' The project is a Full Stack solution, complemented by an administrative system with full CRUD operations, giving operators complete control.
